import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import './ModalWindow.css' const ModalWindow = (props) => { return ( Setting

Showing time:

props.choiceStyleTime("am")} style={{color: props.color}}>{props.timeAm}
props.choiceStyleTime("pm")} style={{color: props.color}}>{props.timePm}

Colors:

{props.stateColors.map(c =>
props.colorsSetClick(c.style)}>
)}
) } export default ModalWindow;
